title: Herbal Anti-Dandruff Shampoo Bar
excerpt: A solid shampoo bar enriched with bhringraj, neem, and tea tree to reduce flaking and nourish the scalp—eco-friendly and travel-friendly.
content:
## What Is This Shampoo Bar?
A natural, eco-friendly anti-dandruff shampoo bar made with saponified oils, bhringraj, neem oil, and tea tree essential oil for a cleansing yet nourishing scalp experience.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Neem and tea tree purify the scalp; bhringraj supports hair roots and reduces breakage.

### Key Benefits
- Reduces dandruff and itchiness.
- Strengthens scalp and roots.
- Zero-waste, long-lasting bar.

## Ingredients
- Saponified plant oils
- Bhringraj powder
- Neem oil
- Tea tree essential oil

## Usage Instructions
- Wet hair, rub bar to lather, massage scalp, rinse thoroughly.

## Packaging
- Cardboard box with optional reusable tin.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid contact with eyes. Tea tree can be strong—patch-test if sensitive.

## Why Choose This Bar?
A powerful yet gentle natural alternative to chemical anti-dandruff shampoos.
